directions: Combine vinegar, pineapple juice, soy sauce, onion, honey, mango juice, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, ginger, sugar, bay leaf, seasoned salt, and basil in a large pot; add ham steak. Cover pot and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate. Remove steak from marinade.
Cook on the preheated grill until warmed, 5 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 bay leaf, or more to taste
1 pinch seasoned salt, or to taste
1 pinch dried basil, or to taste
title: Hawaiian Marinated Ham Steak
